title: gzclient segfault when take screenshot (using external monitor)

content.raw:
screenshot works fine if no external monitor is connected to laptop. 
However, gzclient quit if using an external monitor with error: 

X Error of failed request:  BadWindow (invalid Window parameter)
  Major opcode of failed request:  18 (X_ChangeProperty)
  Resource id in failed request:  0x5600002
  Serial number of failed request:  43
  Current serial number in output stream:  44
